data.title: Holiday & Christmas Lights in Rochester NY: 150-House Driving Tour of the Rochester Area + Fabulous Local Light Events
data.meta_description: Rochester NY's 2023 list of Christmas lights: 100+ houses: Includes Greece, Henrietta, Gates, Hamlin, Irondequoit, Pittsford, Fairport, the City of Rochester, Victor, Farmington, Penfield, Webster, Williamson, Ontario, Nunda, and more!
data.text:
150 spectacular houses in the Rochester area are lit for Christmas each year! Scroll down to see descriptions for each house, town by town!

(This list is being updated every day as word comes in of new locations for 2023.)

PRINT INSTEAD OF SQUINT! Click here to download a printable list (as of 12/9/23)

Our 2023 list of Christmas lights in the Rochester area: Includes Greece, Henrietta, Gates, Hamlin, Irondequoit, Pittsford, Fairport, the City of Rochester, Victor, Farmington, Penfield, Webster, Williamson, Ontario, Nunda, and more!

If you have suggestions for other places to go to see holiday lights (or if you have some yourself that you'd like listed), please email Debra Ross at ross@kidsoutandabout.com the address and/or place to go, and any other information or comments!

And click through to our Master Guide to the Holidays in Rochester!

Holiday Laser returns to the RMSC Strasenburgh Planetarium

A family holiday tradition

The RMSC Strasenburgh Planetarium's family-favorite holiday spectacular returns with a colorful and immersive star show paired with holiday themed lasers that fill the entire dome. This show features your favorite holiday songs played back-to-back, from Mariah Carey to Mannheim Steamroller, choreographed with dancing laser light among the stars of the Planetarium sky. Produced at the Planetarium, this show is a Rochester tradition for families, friends, and out-of-town visitors.

657 East Avenue Rochester NY, 14607 Information: 585.697.1945

355

Bivona Child Advocacy Center brings you the 2023 Holiday Lights Tour of Rochester

A fundraiser to benefit Bivona Child Advocacy Center December 9 - January 1

Bivona Child Advocacy Center has again partnered with some of the brightest and most festively decorated homes in our area to bring you a fun, family-centered event! Bivona's Holiday Lights Tour is a great way to celebrate the holiday magic while supporting children in our community. Take the tour as often as you’d like! Purchase your Sleigh Box(es) and embark on a holiday adventure with family or friends from the comfort of your own car. Sleigh boxes includes: Maps to designated homes & neighborhoods; holiday treats & goodies; fun & festive activities for the family. Sleigh boxes are $50 and are ideal for a family of four. Limited quantities are available. Purchase yours by Dec 8th and then drive through on Dec. 9 from 5-8pm to pick up your box (and say hello to Santa and Mrs. Claus)!

December 9 Sleigh Box Drive-Thru Pick Up at Bivona Child Advocacy Center, 1 Mt. Hope Avenue, Rochester, NY 14620

1807

Christmas at RCCM: Dec 16-23, 2023

Gates open at 6pm nightly. Register for your free ticket now

Christmas at RCCM is truly a magical place…. It’s a place filled with wonder, excitement, and Christmas cheer! Christmas at RCCM consists of 4 major attractions: Miracle, the thrilling and inspiring 4D motion ride; The Name, our brand new and incredible "spoken word”, multi-sensory experience; Raffadali's Great Adventure, our exciting and interactive family show starring Raffadali the donkey; Star’s Yuletide Workshop where cast members assist kids in making their very own Star-themed ornament! Plus don’t miss RCCM’s Musical Light Show Spectacular! Tens of thousands of color-changing lights animated all across the RCCM campus will leave you in awe! All FREE! Each show is about 20 minutes in duration, and each runs continuously from 6-9pm each night.

For more information and to reserve advance tickets, visit RCCM.org or call 585-247-4444. RCCM is located at 3177 Lyell Rd in Gates.

3177 Lyell Rd, Rochester, NY 14606

55066

List for 2023

Over 100 houses are worth the drive this holiday season! You're sure to find lots in your area!

Avon

Scottsville

8 Hanford Avenue, Scottsville, NY, 14546 8 Hanford Ave is verified for 2023 **Click here to send us the address of any other good light displays in Scottsville.

Rush

1361 Middle Road Rush, NY

Lights are on Thanksgiving day until New Year’s Day from 5 PM to 11 PM daily, Lights are on everyday from 4:30-11 PM (with a bonus of 24 hours Christmas Eve and Christmas Night!) If the weather is too windy, the blow ups might not be up. Wishing you a safe and Happy Holidays from our family to yours! 1361 Middle Road is verified for 2023 Click here to send us the address of any other good light displays in Rush.

Henrietta

52 Nevins Road is verified for 2023

Start on Cape Henry Trail off E. River Rd, take that to the end which runs into York Bay Trail and turn right (MANY fantastic displays down that road), after a long and pretty drive it’s ultimately a dead end so you drive back up York Bay Trail to the other end and turn left onto Chesapeake Landing which has more displays and will take you back out to East River Rd.

70 Kentucky Ave is not yet verified for 2023 - if you see it lit, click here to let us know Rahway, Dawson, & Winter Hazel Court, Gates

Part of the Bivona Holiday Lights Tour

35,000 synchronized lights with music playing 20+ songs. Just turn to 98.1 FM to listen and enjoy. November 25- January 1 from dusk to 10pm.

18 Charter Circle is verified for 2023 33 Vince Drive, Gates 14606 33 Vince Drive is verified for 2023 17 Kimberly Anne Drive, Gates 14606 17 Kimberly Anne Drive is verified for 2023 27 Jamee Lane, Gates, 14606

Lights will be lit November 26th through Jan 2! Tune to 91.1 FM and get the songs in your vehicle. 5:00 to 9:00 pm. The songs are changed each week, but there is a way to select the favorites while in front of the house: Send an email to vip-xmas@spectrum.net with the one word subject, to perform the song listed (i.e., send an email with the subject: HOT to have the system perform Hot Chocolate) HOT - Hot Chocolate from the Polar Express; PEANUTS - Lucy asking Linus to play Jingle Bells; WIZARD - Trans Siberian Orchestra's Wizard of Winter; QUEEN - Trans Siberian Orchestra's Queen of the Winter Night; BELLS - Trans Siberian Orchestra's Christmas Eve Sarejavo. After a song is finished, the email will be checked, and the system will perform the song for the last email received only. (It does not queue them, just plays the last email received.)

27 Jamee Lane is verified for 2023 152 Brooklea Dr, Gates, 14624

Light-O-Rama display with lights and music (tune to 107 FM for the music). Songs include: Most Wonderful Time of the Year; Light One Candle; Christmas Party; Zydeco Christmas; Little Saint Nick; This is My Wish; We Need a Little Christmas; Christmas in Sarajevo. The show runs 5 to 10pm each night from the first weekend of December through at least New Year's Day. 152 Brooklea Dr is verified for 2023 1706 Chili Ave, Gates, 14624

Lights will be on from dusk to dawn and will continue until Three Kings Day, January 6th. You will see the brightest light display on Chili Ave. with many lighted trees, including 2 -30 foot trees with 50 ten inch balls and many lawn ornaments. House is lit until January 6. 1706 Chili Ave is verified for 2023 Click here to send us the address of any other good light displays in Gates.

The display is open from Dec 1-Jan 1 from 6pm-10pm m-f. On Christmas Eve the display is on all night.
